Technology Demonstrations

Precompiled for Windows 9x / NT.
This Technology Demonstrations show some features of the free "Game Engine" Nebula.

Requirements 

    P200 +
    3D Accelerator
    Win98:  DirectX 8
    WinNT:  OpenGL

Controls 

    Left   Mouse Button + Mouse Move = Camera Track
    Middle Mouse Button + Mouse Move = Camera Tumble
    Right  Mouse Button + Mouse Move = Camera Dolly   
    Keyboard Space                   = Reset  Camera
